dryskin.Name: Dry Skin
dryskin.Description: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.
dryskin.FullDesc: User heals 1/8 HP each turn during Rain and takes no damage from Water-type moves, when hit by a Water-type move they get healed for 1/4 of their max HP. User loses 1/8 HP each turn during Harsh Sunlight and takes 1.25x damage from Fire-type moves.

queenlymajesty.Name: Queenly Majesty
queenlymajesty.Description: Makes foes unable to use priority attacks.

punkrock.Name: Punk Rock
punkrock.Description: Boosts power and resistance of sound moves.
punkrock.FullDesc: User's moves with the sound flag deal 1.3x damage. User takes 0.5x damage from moves with the sound flag.

stench.Name: Stench
stench.Description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.
stench.FullDesc: When attacking, user's moves have a 10% chance to cause the target to flinch. If user is in the lead, reduces wild pokÃ©mon encounter rate by 50%.

drizzle.Name: Drizzle
drizzle.Description: The PokÃ©mon makes it rain if it appears in battle.

speedboost.Name: Speed Boost
speedboost.Description: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

battlearmor.Name: Battle Armor
battlearmor.Description: The PokÃ©mon is protected against critical hits.

sturdy.Name: Sturdy
sturdy.Description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

damp.Name: Damp
damp.Description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

limber.Name: Limber
limber.Description: The PokÃ©mon is protected from paralysis.

sandveil.Name: Sand Veil
sandveil.FullDesc: User gets 1.5x Defense when under a Sandstorm. If user is in the lead, reduces wild pokÃ©mon encounter rate by 50% on areas with a Sadnstorm.

static.Name: Static
static.Description: Contact with the PokÃ©mon may cause paralysis.
static.FullDesc: When user is hit by a contact move, there's a 30% chance to paralyze the attacker.

voltabsorb.Name: Volt Absorb
voltabsorb.Description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
voltabsorb.FullDesc: User takes no damage from Electric-type moves, when hit by an Electric-type move they get healed for 1/4 of their max HP.

waterabsorb.Name: Water Absorb
waterabsorb.Description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
waterabsorb.FullDesc: User takes no damage from Water-type moves, when hit by a Water-type move they get healed for 1/4 of their max HP.

cloudnine.Name: Cloud Nine
cloudnine.Description: Eliminates the effects of weather and terrain.

compoundeyes.Name: Compound Eyes
compoundeyes.FullDesc: User's moves have 1.3x Accuracy. If user is in the lead, increases chances of wild encounters carrying an item.

insomnia.Name: Insomnia
insomnia.Description: Prevents the PokÃ©mon from falling asleep.

colorchange.Name: Color Change
colorchange.Description: Changes the PokÃ©mon's type to the foe's move.

immunity.Name: Immunity
immunity.Description: Immunity to poison moves and being poisoned.

flashfire.Name: Flash Fire
flashfire.Description: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
flashfire.FullDesc: User is immune to Fire-type moves. The first time they're hit by a Fire-type move, their own Fire-type moves will deal 1.5x damage until they switch out. If user is in the lead, has 50% chance to force wild encounters to be Fire types.

shielddust.Name: Shield Dust
shielddust.Description: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.

owntempo.Name: Own Tempo
owntempo.Description: Prevents the PokÃ©mon from becoming confused.

suctioncups.Name: Suction Cups
suctioncups.Description: Negates all moves that force switching out.
suctioncups.FullDesc: User cannot forcibly be switched out by enemy moves or items. If user is in the lead, increases bite rate when fishing.

intimidate.Name: Intimidate
intimidate.FullDesc: Lowers all adjacent foes' Attack stat by one stage when user enters the field. If user is in the lead, has 50% chance to prevent random encounters from pokÃ©mon 5 or more levels lower.

roughskin.Name: Rough Skin
roughskin.Description: Inflicts damage to the foe on contact.

levitate.Name: Levitate
levitate.Description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

effectspore.Name: Effect Spore
effectspore.Description: Contact may cause poison, paralysis or sleep.
effectspore.FullDesc: When user is hit by a contact move, there's a 30% chance to either poison, paralyze, or sleep the attacker.

clearbody.Name: Clear Body
clearbody.Description: Prevents other PokÃ©mon from lowering its stats.

naturalcure.Name: Natural Cure
naturalcure.Description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

lightningrod.Name: Lightning Rod
lightningrod.Description: Draws in all Electric-type moves to +SpAtk.
lightningrod.FullDesc: User redirects all single target Electric-type moves towards itself and takes no damage from Electric-type moves, when hit by an Electric-type move their Special Attack is increased by one stage. If user is in the lead, has 50% chance to force wild encounters to be Electric types.

serenegrace.Name: Serene Grace
serenegrace.Description: Moves' effect chance x2 but dmg lower by chance%.
serenegrace.FullDesc: User's damaging moves with additional effects get the chance of said effects activating doubled, however, said moves will also deal reduced damage equal to the effect's original infliction chance. Does not affect moves that already have a 100% chance of triggering their effects.

swiftswim.Name: Swift Swim
swiftswim.Description: Boosts the PokÃ©mon's Speed in rain.
swiftswim.FullDesc: User's Speed stat is doubled during Rain.

chlorophyll.Name: Chlorophyll
chlorophyll.Description: Boosts the PokÃ©mon's Speed in sunshine.
chlorophyll.FullDesc: User's Speed stat is doubled during Harsh Sunlight.

illuminate.Name: Illuminate
illuminate.Description: Normal moves become Light-type and 1.2x boost.
illuminate.FullDesc: User's Normal-type moves become Light-type and deal 1.2x damage. If user is in the lead, reduces wild pokÃ©mon encounter rate by 50%.

trace.Name: Trace
trace.Description: The PokÃ©mon copies a foe's Ability.

poisonpoint.Name: Poison Point
poisonpoint.Description: Contact with the PokÃ©mon may poison the attacker.
poisonpoint.FullDesc: When user is hit by a contact move, there's a 30% chance to poison the attacker.

magmaarmor.Name: Magma Armor
magmaarmor.Description: Prevents the PokÃ©mon from becoming frozen.
magmaarmor.FullDesc: User cannot be frozen. When user is in the party, eggs hatch twice as fast.

waterveil.Name: Water Veil
waterveil.Description: Prevents the player's side from burns.

magnetpull.Name: Magnet Pull
magnetpull.FullDesc: When user is on the field, adjacent enemy Steel types cannot switch out or escape. If user is in the lead, has 50% chance to force wild encounters to be Steel types.

soundproof.Name: Soundproof
soundproof.Description: Gives full immunity to all sound-based moves.

raindish.Name: Rain Dish
raindish.Description: The PokÃ©mon gradually regains 1/8 max HP in rain.

sandstream.Name: Sand Stream
sandstream.Description: The PokÃ©mon summons a sandstorm in battle.

pressure.Name: Pressure
pressure.Description: The PokÃ©mon raises the foe's PP usage.

thickfat.Name: Thick Fat
thickfat.Description: Halves damage from Fire and Ice-type moves.

flamebody.Name: Flame Body
flamebody.Description: Contact with the PokÃ©mon may burn the attacker.
flamebody.FullDesc: When user is hit by a contact move, there's a 30% chance to burn the attacker. When user is in the party, eggs hatch twice as fast.

runaway.Name: Run Away
runaway.Description: Ignores trapping and ensures escapes from wild Pokemon.

keeneye.Name: Keen Eye
keeneye.Description: Prevents other PokÃ©mon from lowering accuracy.
keeneye.FullDesc: User's Accuracy cannot be lowered and they will ignore any Evasion stat boosts when attacking. If user is in the lead, has 50% chance to prevent random encounters from pokÃ©mon 5 or more levels lower.

hypercutter.Name: Hyper Cutter
hypercutter.Description: Prevents other PokÃ©mon from lowering Attack stat.

pickup.Name: Pickup
pickup.Description: The PokÃ©mon may pick up items.

truant.Name: Truant
truant.Description: PokÃ©mon can't attack on consecutive turns.

hustle.Name: Hustle
hustle.Description: Boosts the Attack stat but lowers accuracy.
hustle.FullDesc: User has 1.5x Attack but 0.8x Accuracy with physical moves.

cutecharm.Name: Cute Charm
cutecharm.Description: Contact with the PokÃ©mon may cause infatuation.
cutecharm.FullDesc: When user is hit by a contact move, there's a 30% chance to infatuate the attacker. If user is in the lead, has a 66% chance to force wild encounters to be the opposite gender to the user's.

plus.Name: Plus
plus.Description: Ups Sp. Atk if another PokÃ©mon has Plus or Minus.

minus.Name: Minus
minus.Description: Ups Sp. Atk if another PokÃ©mon has Plus or Minus.

stickyhold.Name: Sticky Hold
stickyhold.Description: Protects the PokÃ©mon from item theft.
stickyhold.FullDesc: User's held item cannot be removed, stolen, swapped or destroyed by others. If user is in the lead, increases bite rate when fishing.

shedskin.Name: Shed Skin
shedskin.Description: The PokÃ©mon may heal its own status problems.
shedskin.FullDesc: User has 1/3 chance of automatically recovering from any status conditions it's suffering from at the end of each turn.

guts.Name: Guts
guts.Description: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.
guts.FullDesc: User gets 1.5x Attack when under any status condition. The user also does not lose Attack when burned.

marvelscale.Name: Marvel Scale
marvelscale.Description: Ups Defense if there is a status problem.
marvelscale.FullDesc: User gets 1.5x Defense when under any status condition.

liquidooze.Name: Liquid Ooze
liquidooze.Description: Damages attackers using any draining move.

overgrow.Name: Overgrow
overgrow.Description: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.
overgrow.FullDesc: User's Grass-type moves deal 1.5x damage when they have 1/3 or less HP remaining.

blaze.Name: Blaze
blaze.Description: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.
blaze.FullDesc: User's Fire-type moves deal 1.5x damage when they have 1/3 or less HP remaining.

torrent.Name: Torrent
torrent.Description: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.
torrent.FullDesc: User's Water-type moves deal 1.5x damage when they have 1/3 or less HP remaining.

swarm.Name: Swarm
swarm.Description: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.
swarm.FullDesc: User's Bug-type moves deal 1.5x damage when they have 1/3 or less HP remaining.

rockhead.Name: Rock Head
rockhead.Description: Protects the PokÃ©mon from recoil damage.

drought.Name: Drought
drought.Description: Turns the sunlight harsh if it is in battle.

arenatrap.Name: Arena Trap
arenatrap.FullDesc: When user is on the field, adjacent grounded enemies cannot escape or switch out. If user is in the lead, increases wild pokÃ©mon encounter rate by 100%.

vitalspirit.Name: Vital Spirit
vitalspirit.Description: Prevents the PokÃ©mon from falling asleep.

whitesmoke.Name: White Smoke
whitesmoke.Description: Prevents other PokÃ©mon from lowering its stats.
whitesmoke.FullDesc: Prevents other PokÃ©mon from lowering its stats. If user is in the lead, reduces wild pokÃ©mon encounter rate by 50%.

shellarmor.Name: Shell Armor
shellarmor.Description: The PokÃ©mon is protected against critical hits.

tangledfeet.Name: Tangled Feet
tangledfeet.Description: Raises evasion if the PokÃ©mon is confused.
tangledfeet.FullDesc: When user is confused, incoming moves have 0.5x Accuracy.

motordrive.Name: Motor Drive
motordrive.Description: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.
motordrive.FullDesc: User takes no damage from Electric-type moves, when hit by an Electric-type move their Attack is increased by one stage.

rivalry.Name: Rivalry
rivalry.Description: Deals more damage to a foe of the same gender.

steadfast.Name: Steadfast
steadfast.Description: Raises Speed when the PokÃ©mon flinches.

snowcloak.Name: Snow Cloak
snowcloak.FullDesc: User gets 1.5x Special Defense when under Hail. If user is in the lead, reduces wild pokÃ©mon encounter rate by 50% on areas with Hail.

gluttony.Name: Gluttony
gluttony.Description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

angerpoint.Name: Anger Point
angerpoint.Description: Maxes Attack after taking a critical hit.

unburden.Name: Unburden
unburden.Description: Raises Speed if a held item is used up or lost.

heatproof.Name: Heatproof
heatproof.Description: Halves damage from Fire-type attacks and burns.

simple.Name: Simple
simple.Description: The PokÃ©mon is prone to wild stat changes.
simple.FullDesc: The user doubles any stat drops and boosts it receives.

download.Name: Download
download.Description: Adjusts power according to a foe's defenses.
download.FullDesc: When entering the field, raises Attack by one stage if foes' average Defense is lower than Special Defense, otherwise it raises Special Attack by one stage.

ironfist.Name: Iron Fist
ironfist.Description: Boosts the power of punching moves.
ironfist.FullDesc: User's moves with the punching flag deal 1.2x damage.

poisonheal.Name: Poison Heal
poisonheal.Description: Restores HP if the PokÃ©mon is poisoned.
poisonheal.FullDesc: User takes no damage from poison and bad poison and is healed by 1/8 max HP each turn instead.

adaptability.Name: Adaptability
adaptability.Description: Powers up moves of the same type.
adaptability.FullDesc: Increases STAB from 1.5x damage to 2x damage.

skilllink.Name: Skill Link
skilllink.Description: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.

hydration.Name: Hydration
hydration.Description: Prevents problems with status in rainy weather.

solarpower.Name: Solar Power
solarpower.Description: Ups SpAtk 1.5x in sun; lose 1/8 HP each turn.

quickfeet.Name: Quick Feet
quickfeet.Description: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.
quickfeet.FullDesc: User gets 1.5x Speed when under any status condition. The user also does not lose Speed when paralyzed. If user is in the lead, reduces wild pokÃ©mon encounter rate by 50%.

normalize.Name: Normalize
normalize.Description: Moves become the Normal type and 1.2x boost.
normalize.FullDesc: User's moves become Normal-type and deal 1.2x damage. Moves that were originally Normal-type also get this boost.

sniper.Name: Sniper
sniper.Description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

magicguard.Name: Magic Guard
magicguard.Description: The PokÃ©mon only takes damage from attacks.

noguard.Name: No Guard
noguard.Description: Ensures attacks by or against the PokÃ©mon land.
noguard.FullDesc: Attacks used by or against the user will ignore accuracy checks to always hit. If user is in the lead, increases wild pokÃ©mon encounter rate by 100%.

stall.Name: Stall
stall.Description: The PokÃ©mon moves after all other PokÃ©mon do.

technician.Name: Technician
technician.Description: Powers up the PokÃ©mon's weaker moves.
technician.FullDesc: Moves with 60 or lower BP deal 1.5x damage.

leafguard.Name: Leaf Guard
leafguard.Description: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.

klutz.Name: Klutz
klutz.Description: The PokÃ©mon can't use any held items.

moldbreaker.Name: Mold Breaker
moldbreaker.Description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

superluck.Name: Super Luck
superluck.Description: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.
superluck.FullDesc: User has +1 crit rate on all moves. If user is in the lead, increases chances of wild encounters carrying an item.

aftermath.Name: Aftermath
aftermath.Description: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.
aftermath.FullDesc: When user is KO'ed by a contact move, the attacker loses 1/4 of their max HP.

forewarn.Name: Forewarn
forewarn.Description: Determines what moves a foe has.

unaware.Name: Unaware
unaware.Description: Ignores any stat changes in the PokÃ©mon.

tintedlens.Name: Tinted Lens
tintedlens.Description: Powers up not very effective moves.
tintedlens.FullDesc: Not very effective moves deal 2x damage.

filter.Name: Filter
filter.FullDesc: User takes 0.75x damage from super-effective attacks.

scrappy.Name: Scrappy
scrappy.Description: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type PokÃ©mon.
scrappy.FullDesc: User's Normal and Fighting-type moves deal 1x damage against Ghost types.

stormdrain.Name: Storm Drain
stormdrain.Description: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.
stormdrain.FullDesc: User redirects all single target Water-type moves towards itself and takes no damage from Water-type moves, when hit by a Water-type move their Special Attack is increased by one stage. If user is in the lead, has 50% chance to force wild encounters to be Water types.

icebody.Name: Ice Body
icebody.Description: The PokÃ©mon regains 1/8 max HP in hail.

solidrock.Name: Solid Rock
solidrock.FullDesc: User takes 0.75x damage from super-effective attacks.

snowwarning.Name: Snow Warning
snowwarning.Description: The PokÃ©mon summons a hailstorm in battle.

frisk.Name: Frisk
frisk.Description: The PokÃ©mon can check a foe's held item.

reckless.Name: Reckless
reckless.Description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
reckless.FullDesc: Moves with recoil or crash damage deal 1.2x damage.

multitype.Name: Multitype
multitype.Description: Changes type to match the held Plate.

flowergift.Name: Flower Gift
flowergift.Description: Powers up party PokÃ©mon when it is sunny.

baddreams.Name: Bad Dreams
baddreams.FullDesc: When user is on the field, all adjacent enemies that are asleep will lose 1/8 max HP each turn.

pickpocket.Name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.Description: Steals an item when hit by another PokÃ©mon.

sheerforce.Name: Sheer Force
sheerforce.Description: Removes added effects to increase move damage.
sheerforce.FullDesc: User's moves with additional effects deal 1.3x damage but can no longer inflict those effects.

contrary.Name: Contrary
contrary.Description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

unnerve.Name: Unnerve
unnerve.Description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.

defiant.Name: Defiant
defiant.Description: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.

defeatist.Name: Defeatist
defeatist.Description: Lowers stats when HP becomes half or less.

cursedbody.Name: Cursed Body
cursedbody.Description: May disable a move used on the PokÃ©mon.
cursedbody.FullDesc: When user is hit by a damaging move, there's a 30% chance to disable the attacker's move.

healer.Name: Healer
healer.FullDesc: User has a 30% chance to cure any adjacent allies' status effects at the end of each turn.

friendguard.Name: Friend Guard
friendguard.FullDesc: When user is on the field, all other allies take 0.75x damage.

weakarmor.Name: Weak Armor
weakarmor.Description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.

multiscale.Name: Multiscale
multiscale.Description: Reduces damage when HP is full.
multiscale.FullDesc: User takes 0.5x damage while their HP is full.

toxicboost.Name: Toxic Boost

toxicboost.FullDesc: User's physical attacks deal 1.5x damage when poisoned or badly poisoned.

flareboost.Name: Flare Boost

flareboost.FullDesc: User's special attacks deal 1.5x damage when burned.

harvest.Name: Harvest

harvest.FullDesc: At the end of each turn, the user has a 50% chance to restore the last Berry they consumed during the battle. During Harsh Sunlight this chance becomes 100%. If user is in the lead, has 50% chance to force wild encounters to be Grass types.

telepathy.Name: Telepathy
telepathy.Description: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.

moody.Name: Moody
moody.Description: Raises one stat and lowers another.
moody.FullDesc: Every turn, the user gets one out of their Attack, Special Attack, Defense, Special Defense or Speed raised by two stages at random. The previous turn's boost is lost on the following turn.

overcoat.Name: Overcoat
overcoat.Description: Protects the PokÃ©mon from damage from weather.

poisontouch.Name: Poison Touch
poisontouch.Description: May poison targets when a PokÃ©mon makes contact.
poisontouch.FullDesc: When user hits an enemy with a contact move, there's a 30% chance to poison the target.

regenerator.Name: Regenerator
regenerator.Description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
regenerator.FullDesc: User recovers 33% of their max HP when switched out.

sandrush.Name: Sand Rush
sandrush.Description: Boosts the PokÃ©mon's Speed in a sandstorm.
sandrush.FullDesc: User's Speed stat is doubled during a Sandstorm.

wonderskin.Name: Wonder Skin
wonderskin.Description: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.
wonderskin.FullDesc: Lowers the Accuracy of any Status moves used against the user to 50%.

analytic.Name: Analytic
analytic.Description: Boosts move power when the PokÃ©mon moves last.
analytic.FullDesc: When user moves after all other pokÃ©mon on the field, their moves deal 1.3x damage.

illusion.Name: Illusion
illusion.Description: Comes out disguised as the PokÃ©mon in back.

imposter.Name: Imposter
imposter.Description: It transforms itself into the PokÃ©mon it is facing.

infiltrator.Name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.Description: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.

mummy.Name: Mummy
mummy.Description: Contact with this PokÃ©mon spreads this Ability.

moxie.Name: Moxie
moxie.Description: On KO, Attack is boosted once per switch-in.

justified.Name: Justified
justified.Description: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.

rattled.Name: Rattled
rattled.Description: Some move types scare it and boost its Speed.
rattled.FullDesc: When user gets hit by a Bug, Dark or Ghost-type move, their Speed is boosted by one stage.

sapsipper.Name: Sap Sipper
sapsipper.Description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.
sapsipper.FullDesc: User takes no damage from Grass-type moves, when hit by a Grass-type move their Attack is increased by one stage.

prankster.Name: Prankster

prankster.FullDesc: User's Status moves get +1 priority but become ineffective against Dark types.

sandforce.Name: Sand Force
sandforce.Description: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.
sandforce.FullDesc: User's Rock, Ground and Steel-type moves deal 1.3x damage during a Sandstorm.

ironbarbs.Name: Iron Barbs
ironbarbs.Description: Inflicts damage to the PokÃ©mon on contact.

zenmode.Name: Zen Mode
zenmode.Description: Changes the PokÃ©mon's shape when HP is halved.

victorystar.Name: Victory Star
victorystar.Description: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.

turboblaze.Name: Turboblaze
turboblaze.Description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

teravolt.Name: Teravolt
teravolt.Description: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.

aromaveil.Name: Aroma Veil
aromaveil.Description: Protects against attacks that limit move choices.

flowerveil.Name: Flower Veil
flowerveil.Description: Protects Grass-type allies from stat/status effects.
flowerveil.FullDesc: When user is on the field, all Grass-type allies including the user become immune to stat drops and status effects.

cheekpouch.Name: Cheek Pouch
cheekpouch.Description: Restores HP as well when the PokÃ©mon eats a Berry.
cheekpouch.FullDesc: When the user eats a berry, they also recover 1/3 of their max HP on top of the berry's effect.

protean.Name: Protean
protean.Description: It changes type to that of the move it's about to use.

furcoat.Name: Fur Coat
furcoat.Description: Halves the damage from physical moves.

magician.Name: Magician
magician.Description: Steals the held item of a PokÃ©mon it hits.

bulletproof.Name: Bulletproof
bulletproof.Description: Protects the PokÃ©mon from some ball and bomb moves.

competitive.Name: Competitive
competitive.Description: Sharply boosts Sp. Atk when a stat is lowered.

strongjaw.Name: Strong Jaw
strongjaw.Description: Boosts the power of biting moves.
strongjaw.FullDesc: User's moves with the biting flag deal 1.5x damage.

refrigerate.Name: Refrigerate
refrigerate.Description: Normal-type moves become Ice-type and powered up.
refrigerate.FullDesc: User's Normal-type moves become Ice-type and deal 1.2x damage.

sweetveil.Name: Sweet Veil
sweetveil.Description: Prevents itself and allies from falling asleep.

stancechange.Name: Stance Change
stancechange.Description: Changes between Blade and Shield Forme with attacks.

galewings.Name: Gale Wings
galewings.Description: Flying-type moves gain priority when its HP is full.

megalauncher.Name: Mega Launcher

megalauncher.FullDesc: User's moves with the aura and pulse flags deal 1.5x damage.

grasspelt.Name: Grass Pelt
grasspelt.Description: Boosts the Defense stat on Grassy Terrain.
grasspelt.FullDesc: User gets 1.5x Defense when under Grassy Terrain.

symbiosis.Name: Symbiosis
symbiosis.Description: Passes its held item to an ally that has used theirs.

toughclaws.Name: Tough Claws
toughclaws.Description: Powers up moves that make direct contact.
toughclaws.FullDesc: Moves that make contact deal 1.3x damage.

pixilate.Name: Pixilate
pixilate.Description: Normal-type moves become Fairy-type and powered up.
pixilate.FullDesc: User's Normal-type moves become Fairy-type and deal 1.2x damage.

gooey.Name: Gooey
gooey.Description: Contact with it lowers the attacker's Speed stat.

aerilate.Name: Aerilate
aerilate.Description: Normal-type moves become Flying-type and power up.
aerilate.FullDesc: User's Normal-type moves become Flying-type and deal 1.2x damage.

parentalbond.Name: Parental Bond
parentalbond.Description: All moves land a second hit for 25% damage.

darkaura.Name: Dark Aura
darkaura.Description: Powers up each PokÃ©mon's Dark-type moves.
darkaura.FullDesc: When user is on the field, all pokÃ©mon on both sides deal 1.33x damage with Dark-type moves.

fairyaura.Name: Fairy Aura
fairyaura.Description: Powers up each PokÃ©mon's Fairy-type moves.
fairyaura.FullDesc: When user is on the field, all pokÃ©mon on both sides deal 1.33x damage with Fairy-type moves.

aurabreak.Name: Aura Break
aurabreak.Description: Reverses Aura Abilities to weaken affected moves.
aurabreak.FullDesc: When user is on the field, all Aura abilities are reversed to instead cause affected moves to deal 0.75x damage instead.

primordialsea.Name: Primordial Sea
primordialsea.Description: Changes the weather to nullify Fire-type moves.

desolateland.Name: Desolate Land
desolateland.Description: Changes the weather to nullify Water-type moves.

deltastream.Name: Delta Stream
deltastream.Description: Alters weather to remove Flying-type's weaknesses.

stamina.Name: Stamina
stamina.Description: Boosts Defense when hit by an attack.

wimpout.Name: Wimp Out
wimpout.Description: Cowardly switches out if its HP becomes half or less.
wimpout.FullDesc: When the user's HP is reduced to half or less, the user switches out at the end of the turn.

emergencyexit.Name: Emergency Exit
emergencyexit.Description: Switches out if its HP becomes half or less.
emergencyexit.FullDesc: When the user's HP is reduced to half or less, the user switches out at the end of the turn.

watercompaction.Name: Water Compaction
watercompaction.Description: Sharply ups Defense when hit by a Water-type move.

merciless.Name: Merciless
merciless.Description: When target is poisoned, attacks are critical hits.

shieldsdown.Name: Shields Down
shieldsdown.Description: Its shell breaks if its HP becomes half or less.

stakeout.Name: Stakeout

stakeout.FullDesc: User deals 2x damage when attacking a target on the same turn they switched in.

waterbubble.Name: Water Bubble
waterbubble.FullDesc: User's Water-type moves deal 2x damage. User takes 0.5x damage from Fire-type moves and is immune to Burn.

steelworker.Name: Steelworker
steelworker.FullDesc: User's Steel-type moves deal 1.5x damage. Stacks multiplicatively with STAB.

berserk.Name: Berserk
berserk.Description: Ups Sp. Atk if a hit makes its HP half or less.

slushrush.Name: Slush Rush
slushrush.Description: Boosts the PokÃ©mon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.
slushrush.FullDesc: User's Speed stat is doubled during Hail.

longreach.Name: Long Reach
longreach.Description: Uses moves without making contact with the target.

liquidvoice.Name: Liquid Voice
liquidvoice.Description: Moves with sound flag are Water-type and 1.2x boost.

triage.Name: Triage

triage.FullDesc: Recovery and HP draining moves get +1 priority.

galvanize.Name: Galvanize
galvanize.Description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type and powered.
galvanize.FullDesc: User's Normal-type moves become Electric-type and deal 1.2x damage.

schooling.Name: Schooling
schooling.Description: Forms a powerful school while it has a lot of HP.

disguise.Name: Disguise
disguise.Description: Its shroud protects it from an attack just once.

battlebond.Name: Battle Bond
battlebond.Description: Defeating a foe lets it become Ash-Greninja.

powerconstruct.Name: Power Construct
powerconstruct.Description: Changes with other Cells if HP becomes half or less.

corrosion.Name: Corrosion
corrosion.Description: Poison hits Steel/Poison for 1x and can poison them.
corrosion.FullDesc: User's Poison-type moves deal 1x damage against Steel or Poison types. User can also poison and badly poison Steel and Poison types.

innardsout.Name: Innards Out
innardsout.Description: Damages an attacker that lands the finishing hit.
innardsout.FullDesc: When user faints, deal damage equal to the HP they had remaining before the last attack to the attacker.

dancer.Name: Dancer
dancer.Description: Repeats another PokÃ©mon's dance move immediately.

battery.Name: Battery
battery.Description: Powers up ally PokÃ©mon's special moves.
battery.FullDesc: When user is on the field, all other allies deal 1.3x damage with Special moves.

fluffy.Name: Fluffy
fluffy.Description: Resists contact damage but weaker to Fire-type.
fluffy.FullDesc: User takes 0.5x damage from contact moves, but takes 2x damage from Fire-type moves.

dazzling.Name: Dazzling
dazzling.Description: Makes foes unable to use priority attacks.

soulheart.Name: Soul-Heart
soulheart.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk each time a PokÃ©mon faints.

tanglinghair.Name: Tangling Hair
tanglinghair.Description: Contact with it lowers the attacker's Speed.

receiver.Name: Receiver
receiver.Description: Copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

powerofalchemy.Name: Alchemy
powerofalchemy.Description: Copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

beastboost.Name: Beast Boost
beastboost.Description: Boosts its best stat each time it deals a KO.

rkssystem.Name: RKS System
rkssystem.Description: Its type matches the memory disc it holds.

electricsurge.Name: Electric Surge
electricsurge.Description: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain.

psychicsurge.Name: Psychic Surge
psychicsurge.Description: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain.

mistysurge.Name: Misty Surge
mistysurge.Description: Turns the ground into Misty Terrain.

grassysurge.Name: Grassy Surge
grassysurge.Description: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain.

fullmetalbody.Name: Full Metal Body
fullmetalbody.Description: Prevents other PokÃ©mon from lowering its stats.

shadowshield.Name: Shadow Shield
shadowshield.Description: Resists damage while its HP is full.
shadowshield.FullDesc: User takes 0.5x damage while their HP is full.

prismarmor.Name: Prism Armor
prismarmor.FullDesc: User takes 0.75x damage from super-effective attacks.

neuroforce.Name: Neuroforce
neuroforce.Description: Powers up moves that are super-effective.

ballfetch.Name: Ball Fetch
ballfetch.Description: Fetches the PokÃ© Ball from the first failed throw.

cottondown.Name: Cotton Down
cottondown.Description: Lowers everyone else's Speed when attacked.

dauntlessshield.Name: Dauntless Shield
dauntlessshield.Description: Boosts Defense stat upon entering the battle.

gorillatactics.Name: Gorilla Tactics
gorillatactics.Description: Boosts Attack but only allows the use of one move.
gorillatactics.FullDesc: User has 1.5x Attack but is locked in into the first move they use.

gulpmissile.Name: Gulp Missile
gulpmissile.Description: Attacks with prey caught when using Surf or Dive.

hungerswitch.Name: Hunger Switch
hungerswitch.Description: It alternates between Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode.

iceface.Name: Ice Face
iceface.Description: Prevent a physical attack. Can be restored with hail.

icescales.Name: Ice Scales
icescales.Description: Halves the damage taken from special moves.

intrepidsword.Name: Intrepid Sword
intrepidsword.Description: Boosts Attack stat upon entering the battle.

libero.Name: Libero
libero.Description: It changes type to that of the move it's about to use.

mimicry.Name: Mimicry
mimicry.Description: Changes the PokÃ©mon's type based on the terrain.

neutralizinggas.Name: Neutralizing Gas
neutralizinggas.Description: Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

pastelveil.Name: Pastel Veil
pastelveil.Description: Protects itself and all allies from being poisoned.

perishbody.Name: Perish Body
perishbody.Description: On hit, target + victim faint in 3 turns unless switched.

powerspot.Name: Power Spot
powerspot.Description: Powers up all the moves of all allies.
powerspot.FullDesc: When user is on the field, all other allies deal 1.3x damage.

propellertail.Name: Propeller Tail

ripen.Name: Ripen
ripen.Description: Ripens Berries and increases their effect.

sandspit.Name: Sand Spit
sandspit.Description: Creates a sandstorm when it's hit by an attack.

screencleaner.Name: Screen Cleaner
screencleaner.Description: All screen effects are nullified upon entry.

stalwart.Name: Stalwart
stalwart.Description: Ignores effects that change a move's target.

steamengine.Name: Steam Engine
steamengine.Description: Boosts Speed when hit by a Fire or Water-type move.
steamengine.FullDesc: When user is hit by a Fire or Water-type move, their Speed is increased by six stages. When user is in the party, eggs hatch twice as fast.

steelyspirit.Name: Steely Spirit
steelyspirit.FullDesc: Steel-type moves deal 1.5x damage for all allies on field, including user. Stacks multiplicatively with STAB.

wanderingspirit.Name: Wandering Spirit
wanderingspirit.Description: Taking a contact hit exchanges Abilities.

unseenfist.Name: Unseen Fist
unseenfist.Description: Contact moves negate all protection effects.

quickdraw.Name: Quick Draw
quickdraw.FullDesc: User has a 30% chance to move first in its priority bracket.

curiousmedicine.Name: CuriousMedicine
curiousmedicine.Description: Clears allies' stat changes upon entry.

transistor.Name: Transistor
transistor.FullDesc: User's Electric-type moves deal 1.5x damage. Stacks multiplicatively with STAB.

dragonsmaw.Name: Dragon's Maw
dragonsmaw.FullDesc: User's Dragon-type moves deal 1.5x damage. Stacks multiplicatively with STAB.

chillingneigh.Name: Chilling Neigh

grimneigh.Name: Grim Neigh

honeygather.Description: Gradually regains 1/16 max HP each turn.

charisma.Name: Charisma
charisma.Description: On KO, SpAtk is boosted once per switch-in.

cacophony.Name: Cacophony

virtuoso.Name: Virtuoso
virtuoso.FullDesc: User's Sound-type moves deal 1.5x damage. Stacks multiplicatively with STAB.

nobility.Name: Nobility
nobility.Description: Makes foes unable to use priority attacks.

pureheart.Name: Pure Heart
pureheart.Description: Gradually regains 1/16 max HP each turn.

genius.Name: Genius
genius.Description: Doubles the PokÃ©mon's Sp. Atk stat.

conductor.Name: Conductor

conductor.FullDesc: User's Electric-type moves deal 1x damage against Ground or Electric types.

blacklight.Name: Black Light
blacklight.Description: Light moves become 1.2x power Dark moves.
blacklight.FullDesc: User's Light-type moves become Dark-type and deal 1.2x damage.

whiteout.Name: Whiteout
whiteout.Description: Dark moves become 1.2x power Light moves
whiteout.FullDesc: User's Dark-type moves become Light-type and deal 1.2x damage.

naivety.Name: Naivety
naivety.Description: If you have this ability, go change it.

dishearten.Name: Dishearten
dishearten.Description: Lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat.
dishearten.FullDesc: Lowers all adjacent foes' Special Attack stat by one stage when user enters the field.

vitality.Name: Vitality
vitality.Description: Raises the PokÃ©mon's Sp.Def when hit.

starstruck.Name: Starstruck
starstruck.Description: Powers up Cosmic-type moves in a pinch.
starstruck.FullDesc: User's Cosmic-type moves deal 1.5x damage when they have 1/3 or less HP remaining.

irradiate.Name: Irradiate
irradiate.Description: Powers up Light-type moves in a pinch.
irradiate.FullDesc: User's Light-type moves deal 1.5x damage when they have 1/3 or less HP remaining.

maestro.Name: Maestro
maestro.Description: Powers up Sound-type moves in a pinch.
maestro.FullDesc: User's Sound-type moves deal 1.5x damage when they have 1/3 or less HP remaining.

intuition.Name: Intuition
intuition.Description: Prevents lowering of Sp. Atk stat.

fortification.Name: Fortification
fortification.Description: Ups Def and Sp. Def if a hit makes its HP <50%.

leechingfangs.Name: Leeching Fangs
leechingfangs.Description: Restores 1/8 life with every biting contact move.

ethereal.Name: Ethereal
ethereal.Description: Shields the PokÃ©mon from one contact move.

sharpshooter.Name: Sharp Shooter
sharpshooter.Description: All non-contact moves always hit their target.

cannonfire.Name: Cannon Fire
cannonfire.FullDesc: User's moves with the bomb flag deal 1.5x damage.

icyveins.Name: Icy Veins
icyveins.Description: Ups Ice and Water moves in hail.
icyveins.FullDesc: User's Ice and Water-type moves deal 1.3x damage during Hail.

realism.Name: Realism
realism.Description: Halves damage from Ghost and Fairy-type moves.

pounce.Name: Pounce
pounce.Description: On switch-in, user gains priority for first move.

leadership.Name: Leadership
leadership.Description: On switch-in, user gains priority for first move.

darkmatter.Name: Dark Matter
darkmatter.Description: Normal moves become 1.2x power Cosmic moves.
darkmatter.FullDesc: User's Normal-type moves become Cosmic-type and deal 1.2x damage.

wintergift.Name: Winter Gift
wintergift.Description: Powers up party's SpAtk/SpDef in hail.
wintergift.FullDesc: When user is on the field, all allies including user get 1.5x Special Attack and Special Defense during Hail.

tormented.Description: Boosts the Sp.Atk stat but lowers accuracy.

arsonist.Name: Arsonist

vengeful.Name: Vengeful

astralmajesty.Description: Halves damage from Light and Dragon-type moves.

spellcaster.FullDesc: User's Psychic-type moves deal 1.5x damage when they have 1/3 or less HP remaining.

attunement.Name: Attunement
attunement.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk if there is a status problem.

terminator.Name: Terminator
terminator.Description: Ups Atk if a hit makes its HP <50%.

nebulacloud.Name: Nebula Cloud
nebulacloud.FullDesc: When user is on the field, all Cosmic-type allies including the user become immune to stat drops and status effects.

clayform.Name: Clay Form
clayform.Description: The PokÃ©mon regains 1/8 max HP in a sandstorm.

synthesize.Name: Synthesize
synthesize.Description: The PokÃ©mon regains 1/8 max HP in sunlight.

lightaura.Name: Light Aura
lightaura.Description: Powers up each PokÃ©mon's Light-type moves.
lightaura.FullDesc: When user is on the field, all pokÃ©mon on both sides deal 1.33x damage with Light-type moves.

lightbulb.Name: Light Bulb
lightbulb.Description: Weakens incoming Dark moves, 2x Light moves
lightbulb.FullDesc: User's Light-type moves deal 2x damage. User takes 0.5x damage from Dark-type moves.

antigravity.Name: Anti-Gravity

packedsnow.Name: Packed Snow
packedsnow.Description: Halves effectiveness of S/E moves in hail.

hivemind.Name: Hivemind
hivemind.FullDesc: User's Bug-type moves deal 1.5x damage. Stacks multiplicatively with STAB.

irredeemable.Name: Irredeemable
irredeemable.Description: Halves damage from Light and Fairy-type moves.

bonecollector.Name: Bone Collector
bonecollector.FullDesc: User's Ground-type moves deal 1.5x damage. Stacks multiplicatively with STAB.

scorchscale.Name: Scorch Scale
scorchscale.Description: Burns any attacker that uses priority moves on it.

rockypayload.Name: Rocky Payload
rockypayload.FullDesc: User's Rock-type moves deal 1.5x damage. Stacks multiplicatively with STAB.

hivebody.Name: Hive Body
hivebody.FullDesc: When user is hit by a move that makes contact, there's a 30% chance to trap the attacker in Infestation.

angershell.Name: Anger Shell
angershell.Description: The PokÃ©mon's stats change at or below half health.
angershell.FullDesc: When HP is reduced to 50% or less, user's Defense and Special Defense are lowered by one stage, while their Attack, Special Attack and Speed are raised by one stage.

costar.Name: Costar
costar.Description: Copies an ally's stat changes upon entry.

sharpness.Name: Sharpness
sharpness.FullDesc: User's moves with the slicing flag deal 1.5x damage.

toxicdebris.Name: Toxic Debris
toxicdebris.FullDesc: When hit by a move that makes contact, user sets up Toxic Spikes on the enemy side of the field.

eartheater.Name: Earth Eater
eartheater.Description: Restores HP if hit by a Ground-type move.
eartheater.FullDesc: User takes no damage from Ground-type moves, when hit by a Ground-type move they get healed for 1/4 of their max HP.

requiem.Name: Requiem
requiem.FullDesc: User's Dark-type moves deal 1.5x damage. Stacks multiplicatively with STAB.

affection.Name: Affection
affection.FullDesc: User's Fairy-type moves deal 1.5x damage. Stacks multiplicatively with STAB.

disarray.Name: Disarray
disarray.FullDesc: User sets up Trick Room when entering the field.

cometstorm.Name: Comet Storm
cometstorm.Description: +1 Speed/SpAtk when hit by a Rock-type move
cometstorm.FullDesc: User takes no damage from Rock-type moves, when hit by a Rock-type move their Special Attack and Speed is increased by one stage.

maelstrom.Name: Maelstrom

maelstrom.FullDesc: When user is on the field, adjacent grounded enemies cannot escape or switch out. When user is hit by a move that makes contact, there's a 30% chance to trap the attacker in a Whirlpool.

hadronengine.Name: Hadron Engine
hadronengine.Description: Electric Terrain activates and ups Attack/Sp. Atk.
hadronengine.FullDesc: User sets up Electric Terrain when entering the field and gets 1.33x Attack and Special Attack when under Electric Terrain.

tropicalhide.Name: Tropical Hide
tropicalhide.Description: Halves damage from Grass and Water-type moves.

opportunist.Name: Opportunist
opportunist.Description: Copies an opponent's stat boost whenever it happens.

haunted.Name: Haunted
haunted.FullDesc: User's Ghost-type moves deal 1.5x damage. Stacks multiplicatively with STAB.

reaper.Name: Reaper
reaper.Description: Fainting foes in trainer battles heal you for 20%.

windrider.Name: Wind Rider
windrider.Description: No damage from wind, ups Atk/SpAtk instead.
windrider.FullDesc: Takes no damage from wind moves, but increases Attack and Special Attack by one stage instead.

teleface.Name: TV Face
teleface.Description: Prevent a physical attack. Restored in electric terrain.
teleface.FullDesc: Protects from one physical attack, entering electric terrain will restore this shield. Form and stats change when the shield is down.

darkswarm.Name: Dark Swarm
darkswarm.Description: Forms a dark swarm while it has > 25% HP and at Level 20+.

symphony.Name: Symphony
symphony.Description: Forms a symphony while it has > 25% HP and at Level 20+.

destructivecore.Name: Dest. Core
destructivecore.Description: It explodes if its HP becomes half or less.
destructivecore.FullDesc: When HP is reduced to 50% or less, user changes to Reactive Form. This form has reduced defenses but increased Attack and Speed.

windfury.Name: Wind Fury
windfury.Description: Boosts wind moves 30%/ Reduces Wind dmg 50%.
windfury.FullDesc: User's moves with the wind flag deal 1.3x damage. User takes 0.5x damage from moves with the wind flag.
